column4: I am using virtual box with windows 2000 so I can use an external tv tuner, but it isn't seeing the usb device.  I'm new to ubuntu and wonder if I am needing to 'mount' the device somehow in linux first?
which version of virtualbox is this?
installed how? You need the closed version of vbox for this feature
you probably need to grab the debs or repo off virtualbox.org by hand. The "open source edition" version in ubuntu doesn't have the feature you're after. See http://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Editions
I'm downloading the source now and reading the build instructions- thanks for the help
